local_intent: move above red_plate, lower until contact, verify contact and pose, place object, open gripper, retreat
assumptions: white_plate is already grasped and stable in gripper
red_plate_pose is available on the blackboard or can be perceived by ScanForTarget
coherence_with_global: Continues the global transfer plan: ensures red_plate is visible, moves above it, lowers to contact, places the white plate at the red_plate_pose, opens gripper, and retreats.
